item.title: Working with topics
item.description: rostopic list ros2 topic info /myrobot/sensor1 ros2 topic info -v /myrobot/sensor1 ros2 topic echo /myrobot/sensor1 ros2 interface show std_msgs/msg/Int32 ros2 topic pub /myrobot/blink_led std_msgs/msg/Int32 "{data: 1}"
